directions: Place peanut butter and honey in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave on high until melted enough to stir, about 30 seconds. Add oats, dried fruit, almonds, whey protein powder, and cinnamon; stir to combine. Form into balls and place on a plate. Chill in refrigerator, about 1 hour.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or as desired (optional)
title: Protein No Bake Drops
